purpose: The email announces the 5th IEEE International Conference on Code Quality (ICCQ'25), scheduled for December 13, 2025, at Ural Federal University in Russia. It invites researchers to submit papers and abstracts by August 10, 2025, and outlines the review process and publication criteria. The conference aims to improve the quality of source code through collaboration and sharing of innovative ideas in the field.
evidence_sentences: Name: 5th International Conference on Code Quality (ICCQ)

We aim to solve this problem by gathering together cutting-edge researchers and letting them share their most recent ideas on static analysis, program verification, bug detection, and software maintenance.
Papers will be reviewed by three PC members using a double-blind review process.
